Interface ReviewService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReviewServiceImpl
public interface ReviewService
ReviewService is an interface that defines the methods for handling review-related operations. These operations include creating, updating, and retrieving reviews, as well as calculating review statistics.

The methods in this interface throw BadRequestException and NotFoundException when the input is invalid or when the requested review data is not found.

  • Method Details

    • createReview

      ReviewDTO createReview(ReviewDTO reviewDTO) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Creates a new review.
      Parameters:
      reviewDTO - the ReviewDTO containing review data to be created.
      Returns:
      the created ReviewDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the review data is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if the associated cafeteria or user is not found.

    • updateReview

      ReviewDTO updateReview(Long id, ReviewDTO reviewDTO) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Updates an existing review.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the review to be updated.
      reviewDTO - the ReviewDTO containing the updated review data.
      Returns:
      the updated ReviewDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the review data is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if the review or associated cafeteria/user is not found.

    • getReviewsByCafeteriaId

      List<ReviewDTO> getReviewsByCafeteriaId(Long id) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of reviews for a specific cafeteria.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the cafeteria.
      Returns:
      a list of ReviewDTO for the specified cafeteria.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the cafeteria ID is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if no reviews are found for the given cafeteria.

    • getCountReviews

      Integer getCountReviews(Long cafeteriaId) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves the count of reviews for a specific cafeteria.
      Parameters:
      cafeteriaId - the ID of the cafeteria.
      Returns:
      the number of reviews for the given cafeteria.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the cafeteria ID is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if no reviews are found for the given cafeteria.

    • getRating

      Double getRating(Long cafeteriaId) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves the average rating for a specific cafeteria based on its reviews.
      Parameters:
      cafeteriaId - the ID of the cafeteria.
      Returns:
      the average rating for the given cafeteria.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the cafeteria ID is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if no reviews are found for the given cafeteria.

    • getReviewsByUserId

      List<ReviewDTO> getReviewsByUserId(Long userId) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of reviews written by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user.
      Returns:
      a list of ReviewDTO written by the given user.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the user ID is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if no reviews are found for the given user.
